title: [Req] Delicious 1,2, Winter Edition (Deluxe) [Wendy99] ~ Maraya
description:
Delicious 1, 2 & Winter Edition (Deluxe) (TMG) ~ Maraya21  [REQUEST]

Delicious 1 Deluxe:
 
http://i.imgur.com/7dNEWq4.jpg

Have you always dreamed of opening your own restaurant? Are you no stranger to multi-tasking? You'll love Emily, who makes her dreams come true in Delicious Deluxe. This delicious game contains two game modes and seven different restaurants. The more success Emily achieves, the more tables, employees and even stars you may acquire! Roll up your sleeves and help Emily!

Features:
- seven restaurants
- two game modes
- bonuses like chocolate, bigger trays and stars
- five types of customers

System Requirements:
OS: Windows 2000 /98 / ME / XP / 7 / 8 / 10
CPU: 500 MHz Pentium 3 or equivalent
RAM: 128 MB 

Screens: 
http://i.imgur.com/vM2r9GG.jpg 
http://i.imgur.com/6FCTjPz.jpg
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Delicious 2 Deluxe:
 
http://i.imgur.com/NmKlhqP.jpg

Emily is back in Delicious 2 Deluxe! Emily is always ready to help everybody out, and in this time management adventure especially her Uncle Antonio could use a helping hand. 
Antonio really needs someone to help him manage his restaurant. Luckily, catering just so happens to be Emily's specialty!
This tasty game contains 2 game modes, 60 levels, and 5 brand new restaurants that you can customise with decorations you can pick and switch. Are you ready to help Emily bring another fun time management adventure to a good end? 

Features:
- 5 new restaurants
- 2 game modes: Antonio's Restaurants and The Happy Customer
- Decorate your restaurant
- 60 new levels with new customers

System Requirements:
OS: Windows XP/Vista/7
Processor: PIII 500 MHz
RAM: 128 MB
Graphics Card: 16-bit
Disk space: 300 MB

Screens: 
http://i.imgur.com/dbc3HMV.jpg 
http://i.imgur.com/H6Px7cQ.jpg
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Delicious Winter Edition Deluxe:
 
http://i.imgur.com/sx2QWdU.jpg

Put on your apron! In the busy month of December Emily could sure use some extra help in Delicious winter edition Deluxe. She has decorated the restaurant beautifully and will be serving delicious Christmas treats. This festive game consists of 2 game modes and 7 different restaurants. Roll up your sleeves and lend Emily a hand!
Don't wait any longer - Play Delicious winter edition for free today!

Features:
- 7 restaurants
- 2 game modes
- Bonuses like chocolate, bigger trays and stars
- A lovely Christmas atmosphere

System Requirements:
OS: Windows 7/8/10
Processor: 1 GHz or higher
Memory: 512 MB RAM or more
DirectX Version: 9.0 or higher

Screens: 
http://i.imgur.com/Vp48pi4.jpg 
http://i.imgur.com/Af7lWNJ.jpg


Torrent dead? __ Torrent DMCA'ed? __  You have a problem with the game/file not working/opening? __ There is a game you desire to play like crazy but is not uploaded?
